reviewText: I love this film which I saw years ago,  but need a DVD with ENGLISH subtitles to use with an intermediate French class. I have tried all over the world to find such a copy with no luck. If you have one to sell please contact davidjeanmayes@gmail.com

I can't comment on the movie since I have not watched it. But I did purchase this from the Amazon France site since it was not available here last year. No English subtitles on mine. So if you don't speak French, this DVD may not be so great.
